## Getting started

```{r}
library(ruml)
library(plantuml)
```

```{r}
library(polmineR)
```


## Minimal example

```{r}
plantuml_code <- make_plantuml_code("count", pkg = polmineR)
plantuml_obj <- plantuml(plantuml_code)
plot(plantuml_obj, vector = TRUE)
```
